en.content:
Hello,

A new device ({ deviceName }) wants to join your UpSignOn vault.

To authorize it, please enter the following code in the interface:
en.availableCode: This code is valid until { availableCodeDate }.
en.warning: If you are not the originator of this request, don't worry: do not validate anything and contact your administrator to investigate ğŸ” ğŸ‘®ï¸
